sections.heading: Creation of State Office of Administrative Hearings (Soahr) as Type I Agency Within Department of Labor and Economic Growth; Duties; Services; Hearings; Functions and Personnel Not Subject to Transfer; Transfer of Administrative Rule Processing and Review Function by Type III Transfer
